column1: good length outside off, nips away after pitching. Tries to cut but misses
good length on middle stump, mistimed pull to mid on
full and wide, and crunched past cover! Played off the front foot and beats the infield
full on middle stump, tapped to midwicket with soft hands
good length on middle and off, defended off the front foot
full outside off, drives away from his body with the bat's open face. Runs it down to third man
overpitched wide outside off, sticks his bat out and plays towards point
good length wise outside off, cuts through the ball's line and beats point! Races away thereafter
back of a length outside off, and it's punched off the back foot. Goes between the two infielders on the off side, forcing the fielders to give it a chase
good length on middle stump, chopped down to third man off the back foot
short on middle, swivels and pulls fine! No chance for fine leg to intercept
full ball on off stump, driven down the ground to the bowler
wider outside off, opens the bat face and chops it down to third man
a tad short outside off, Shehzad gets underneath it and slashes over backward point
full, swinging back in, guided to third man with the open face. Nicely played
full and wide, moving away, struggling for timing, hit away towards mid-off
that will be the length on this stadium, shortish around middle, pulled away to deep square leg for a single
slashed, full and wide with plenty of width. Fakhar opens the bat face and carves it away with the open face past point. Lovely timing on that from Zaman, can't bowl there to him
good length delivery outside off, 137 kph, moves away. Zaman's feet don't move, the ball moves away and beats the bat
full around middle and leg, Fakhar comes down and inside-edges it down to short fine leg.
nicely bowled, 140 kph, full around off, swinging back in, defended towards mid-off. He wants one, but Wheeler is quick on it
141 kph, nice and full, swinging back in, driven with the angle of swing, to mid-on
full and straight, more swing, 139 kph, hit to midwicket. Tidy comeback from Wheeler after that first ball, even got some swing
smashed. Full around off, can't bowl that length at Eden Park. It's full and straight, Fakhar clears his front leg and bludgeons it straight, past mid-off
well played, shortish around off, guides the ball to third man off the open face
bad timing, but over mid-on. Rance makes the error of bowling that full length, around middle and leg, Shehzad clears his front leg and mis-times a lofted drive over the fielder
nicely played, but it is still full. Driven to mid-on
a low full toss around off, 138 kph, pushed to mid-off. Good single, keeps the pressure off
that's his wheelhouse. Short and wide, Zaman gets underneath the length and carves a cut with so much ease over backward point
back of a length on middle stump, muscles his pull down the ground but comes off the bat's top half. Straight to mid on
back of a length on leg stump, swivels and pulls along the carpet past square leg. Chase for the man from deep midwicket, but he can't cut it off
full on off stump, smacked down the ground with some power! Got his front foot out of the way, and bunted this past Fakhar. Mid off's diving effort can't stop it either
back of a length on leg stump, clipped off his pads to square leg for a quick single
good length on middle stump, angling into the left hander, and Fakhar simply pulls this behind square by dragging this behind. Too short, and sent for a boundary with fine leg inside the circle
full outside off, swinging away from the batsman. Slapped off the front foot, but straight to cover. Misses out on a wide ball
full on off stump, straighter one. Defended off the front foot, back to Sodhi
full just outside off, tries to drive towards cover but the spin induces the inside edge. Played through to mid on instead
flatter ball on a good length. Pitches on middle stump. Turned off his hips to midwicket with soft hands. Nice call early for the single
good length just outside off, and spins away from the batsman after pitching. Tries to cut, but way too close to his body for that shot. Misses, and the ball flies just over his bat
full on off stump, prods forward and taps it down the ground to long off for a walking single
tossed up full outside off, swept hard after getting down on one knee. Man in the deep there
full on leg stump, tries to sweep but misses the shot. Raps his pads instead as the ball trickles down to short fine leg
good length outside off, rocks back and punches off the back foot to long off. Good effort from Santner diving to his left, but can't stop it from going past him
all the way! Flat-batted maximum! Full on off stump, and Fakhar comes down the ground and bunts it over the bowler's head. Lands straight into the sightscreen
another maximum! Over cow corner this time. Uses his feet once again to get to the length of this full ball on leg stump, slogged over to the leg side, and it lands in the stands

lucky this time! Full and wide outside off with the batsman charging down the ground. The wide line forces the batsman to reach at it. Wild slog takes the top edge over the keeper's head. Work for third man running back

this time it's over deep midwicket! Full on middle stump, and he comes down the wicket once more. Slogged square to the leg side, and it's off the middle of the bat. Into the stands once more. Did really well to get to the length of the ball
good length on off stump, backs away towards the leg side and carved off the back foot to deep point
full on middle stump, no spin on this occasion. The batsman prods forward in an attempt to defend, but played down the wrong line. Hits his pads
good length outside off, spins further away. Cut off the back foot, but brilliantly stopped by Williamson, who sticks one hand out at point and stops the ball
full on off stump, tapped towards point with soft hands, and they take off for a quick single. Great work from Williamson, who throws it in a flash. It's a direct hit, but Fakhar was home
overpitched full on middle stump, squeezed back to the bowler
good length on off stump, extra bounce this time that surprises the batsman. Stays deep in his crease as he pokes at the ball. Takes a thick edge and lands near mid off. Excellent over from Sodhi
good length on off stump, quick ball that forces the batsman to go onto his back foot. Firmly punched back to Rance

full and wide outside off, driven square to cover point and Fakhar wants a single. Shehzad doesn't want the single, and Guptill's throw was on target, but bounces just over the stumps at the non-striker's end. Fakhar survives
back of a length on middle and off, pulled over the infield, but goes to deep midwicket on the bounce
short on middle stump, stays tall and pulls along the carpet to deep midwicket. There's his maiden fifty!

beautiful! Another flat six. Full on off stump, and he smacks it through the ball's line. Lifted over the non-striker's head, but hit so hard that long on has no chance. He sees it soar over the ropes. What great timing

holes out this time! Slightly slower ball on off stump, and Shehzad tries to repeat the same shot. Deceived by the pace, and through his shot too early. Doesn't have the distance, and taken by de Grandhomme at long on
full outside leg stump, tries to clip this fine down the leg side but can't get bat to ball. Hits his pads but impact's outside leg. They scamper across for the single
back of a length outside off, stays in his crease and punched back past the non-striker to long on

another slower ball fetches a wicket! Short on leg stump, and Fakhar attempts to pull this behind square. But there's no pace behind that delivery for the pull shot. Plus, he's through his shot too early. Top edged to fine leg, who composes himself and completes the catch
full on off stump, driven off the front foot, and played down the ground to long on
good length on off stump but angling into the right hander, flicked off his pads to deep midwicket. Calls early for the second run
full just outside off, tapped past the non-striker to long on once again
good length wide outside off, waits for it before cutting square off the back foot. Straight to Munro at deep cover
good length on middle stump, swivels and pulls along the ground to deep midwicket. Hit too well, actually. Fetches him only a single
quicker ball, darted full on middle stump but going down the leg side. Sharp take from the keeper
floated on a good length but pitches wide outside off, turns past the wide line. Got to bowl that again
short on off stump, muscles his pull down the ground to long on. Comes off the bat's top half. Quicker ball this time
good length on off stump, angles into the batsman as he pulls to long on once more. Straight to the fielders
full ball on middle stump, squeezed past the bowler's left to long off. Keeping it tight
full ball on off stump, smartly defended with soft hands towards cover. Early call for a single, and they race through with ease
full on middle and leg, down on one knee and swept very fine! Paddled actually, and no chance for fine leg to intercept. Not timed as well as he would've wanted, but he'll take it
short on off stump, and soars over Sarfraz's head as he pulls out off the pull shot. The umpires call it a wide, albeit tentatively. CDG isn't pleased
good length on off stump, turned off his pads to midwicket. Babar wants the second, but slips while turning

glorious straight drive! Full on off stump, and that's driven off the front foot past the bowler. Mid off races to his right, but his slide ain't good enough either. Races away to the long-off boundary
full on middle and leg, worked off his pads behind square on the leg side. Man in the deep, though
back of a length on middle stump, nudged off his pads to the man at deep midwicket once again
fuller ball on middle and off, driven towards the leg side off the front foot. Played towards cow corner
full on leg stump and it's gently tapped off the front foot towards Bruce in the deep on the leg side. Rotates the strike

good length on middle stump, too close to his body for the cut so Sarfraz opens the bat's face late and runs it down to third man. Diving effort from the keeper to stop that ball, but can't get his hands to it
back of a length on middle stump, uses his wrists to whip this off the back foot to midwicket. Calls for the single, and they take Santner's arm on
overpitched outside off stump, and angling further away. Goes over the wide guidelines
back of a length on leg stump, swivels and pulls to deep fine leg off the back foot. Sodhi the man there
short on leg stump, challenges Babar with that delivery. Forces the batsman to duck, and get under the line of the ball. First bouncer of the over

back of a length on leg stump, and it's flicked beautifully off his pads! Flies over square leg and threads the gap between fine leg and deep midwicket. Superb placement, and ends the over with a boundary
full outside off and turning away after pitching, sticks his bat out and chops it down to short third man
good length on middle and leg, turns across the batsman's body. Tapped towards midwicket with soft hands. No fielder there, forcing the bowler to race behind it
good length on middle stump, pulled off the back foot to the man at deep midwicket. Not hit well enough
tossed up full outside off, it's a low full toss and it's driven past cover off the front foot. Beats the infielder, but Santner races across from long off to intercept that shot. Stops the boundary
good length on middle stump, tentatively turned off the back foot to square leg for a single
full and wide outside off, spins away once again. Cut late off the back foot to short third man. Can't stop them from stealing a single, though
full on off stump, and it's smacked over Boult first ball! Hit through the ball's line after clearing the front foot. Lands full on the sightscreen. What a shot
fuller ball but wide outside off, gives it a big heave towards the off side but can't make contact. He had backed away too much to the leg side, and couldn't reach at the ball
good length on leg stump, pulled well but straight to midwicket. One foot on either side of the fielder and that would've been four
too short! Pitches on leg stump and soars over Sarfraz's head. Tried to pull, but the ball went over his shoulders
good length on leg stump, glanced off his hips to fine leg. Paddled away, just helping the ball on its way

full on off stump, and it's hit straight down the ground! Boult dives to his left but can't stop it. And neither can the diving mid-off fielder. Quick outfield and that crashes into the long-off boundary. There's the fifty partnership!
full on middle and leg, flicked to midwicket off his pads for the single and there's the team 150!
tossed up, and punished! Full on off stump, and Babar comes down the ground and bunts it over Sodhi. Hit dead straight. No chance for either long on or long off
full on off stump, tries to smack it straight once more but dropped by Sodhi. Stuck his left hand out, but the ball hits his hand and lands nearby. Saves three for certain
lifted inside out! Full on off stump, Sarfraz backs away making some extra room, and driven over the infield. No chance for either deep point nor wide long off. Floats away into the boundary

lands in the second tier! Short on middle stump and Sarfraz generates some extra pace off the shot with a whip towards the leg side. Pulled with a lot of bat speed behind it, and it lands in the stands beyond deep midwicket
full outside off, and spins further away. Too wide, and Sarfraz chooses not to offer a shot
good length outside off, cut late off the back foot to short third man
full outside off, tapped off the front foot with the bat's open face. Played to deep point
full and wide outside off, goes beyond the wide line on the off side. Seventh wide of the innings
overpitched outside off, eventually it's a low full toss. Tries to drive but takes a thick outside edge. Runs down to third man
full and wide outside off once again. Eventually comes to Sarfraz as another low full toss. Carved behind square to deep point by sticking his bat out
full and wide outside off, but once again beyond the tramlines

b>full toss, and dispatched! On off stump as Rance misses his line and Babar muscles this over the bowler's head. Perfect timing off the bat's middle, and it lands just beyond the long-off boundary. The fielder was interested in the deep, but eventually gave up as the ball came towards him
full and wide outside off, it goes through from inside the tramlines but the umpire calls it wide anyway. Third wide of the over. Oooo, close call
slower ball, full on off stump. Driven straight but takes the outside edge through to third man

slower ball full on middle stump, slogged towards the leg side and lobbed to Santner at midwicket. But he's lost it! Fluffs the catch. He may have lost it in the crowd. Lucky for Sarfraz. Goes down as a dropped chance
full on off stump, driven down the ground but straight to the bowler
back of a length on off stump, extra bounce takes it through to the keeper and Sarfraz misses the late glance
What. A. Shot! Full on middle stump, Sarfraz gets his front foot out of the way and lifts this towards the leg side. Manages to get under the ball, and sent into the stands
slower ball does the trick! Good length on off stump, and the batsman tries to repeat that shot, but he's through his pull too early. Holes out to Munro at midwicket, who completes a sharp catch
short on middle stump, pulled into the deck and goes through to wide mid on
this time Santner holds on! Short on middle and pulled too early! Top edged and easily taken by the man at midwicket. Almost a front-foot no ball from Wheeler, but good to earn the wicket

terrific attempt from Rance, but dropped! Short on off and pulled off the back foot. Top edged again, and Rance races in from fine leg and dives forward with his left hand stretched out, but the ball pops out. Great effort nonetheless
full on middle stump, muscles the slog to midwicket. They scamper across for the single, giving Babar the strike
good length but wide outside off, angling across the batsman's body. Driven over cover but takes the top edge instead. Through to third man. Brings Hasan Ali back on strike
full and fast outside off, wild heave towards the off side from the batsman, and it's an outside edge that's very fine! Flies over the keeper, and through for four
short on middle stump, tries to pull this away but the ball stays low. Hits his shoulder. Ouch
low full toss on middle stump, slogged towards the leg side but straight to midwicket. They're running anyway, and completed

There's Babar's fifty and the team 200! Short on leg stump and pulled away towards cow corner. Two men in the deep but neither can stop it. Strong end from Pakistan to their innings. They finish on 201 for 4
good length on leg stump, Guptill turns it off his gloves fine down the leg side. Perfect start for New Zealand but the umpire thinks it's come off his thighs. Goes down as leg byes
good length on off stump, tapped off the back foot to cover
good length on middle stump, angling across Guptill. Drops his hands and glances it to backward point
full on middle and off, and angling across once again. Big stride forward covering the line of the ball, and then left alone
back of a length on middle and off, tries to leave the ball but it's too close to his body. Defends it towards the off side tentatively
good length on middle and leg, chopped down to third man off the back foot. He'll keep strike
back of a length on leg stump, flicked off his toes to midwicket. Played off the back foot
back of a length on middle and leg, pulled along the carpet towards cow corner. Work for the man in the deep, who runs to his left and parries it back
good length on leg stump, tapped off the back foot to midwicket. No run this time
too short on leg stump, soars over Guptill's head with the batsman offering no shot. Easy decision for the umpire
back of a length on leg stump, Guptill charges down the wicket but is cramped for room. Flicked off his hips to short fine leg
full and wide outside off, slogged towards the leg side but not off the middle of the bat. Oh, no. He's overstepped. Free hit
full outside leg, and he's punished! Uses his wrists to whip this off his toes. Squeezed between square leg and short third man, and that races away
full on leg stump, clipped off his toes to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, goes away towards the leg side and slaps this over point. Beats the infield and lands just beyond Shadab, but not enough muscle behind that shot to get four
back of a length on middle and leg, cramps Guptill. Can't free his arms. Tapped towards the leg side
short on middle stump, and angling away. Too much width on offer, and Guptill slaps this over point for a maximum. Frees his arms, and goes through with his shot. Earns him half-a-dozen
full on middle stump, driven straight but comes off the bat's toe end. Straight to mid off
yorker just outside off stump, squeezed away with the bat's open face to third man
traps him! Full on off stump, and Munro misses the leg-side flick after walking across to the off side. Hits him full in front of off stump, and the umpire raises his finger for the lbw
back of a length on leg stump, flicked off his pads fine down the leg side. Work for deep backward square, but his diving effort stops the boundary
good length on middle and leg, punched off the back foot to mid on. They scramble across for the single
good length on middle and leg, flicked off his hips to midwicket and it's been lobbed to the fielder! Diving catch, jumping across to his right, and it's a superb take from Haris. KW falls cheaply
full on middle stump, worked towards the leg side after prodding forward. Played to deep backward square
good length on leg stump, flicked off his pads to square leg. Keeping it tight
slower ball full outside leg, flicked fine down the leg side but sharply collected by the keeper diving to his left
good length on middle stump, goes down the leg side as the batsman misses his flick
back of a length outside off, lifts one leg and flicks this over square leg to the man in the deep
short on middle stump and he goes with the pull shot. Extra bounce takes the outside edge over the keeper's head!
back of a length outside off, slashes hard at it and it's going straight to third man! But dropped! And it goes over for a six! The captain cannot believe it. Rumman the guilty man there.
full on middle and leg, Bruce was backing away towards the leg side anyway. Driven to cover
short, wide, misses the cut
bouncer outside off, jumps over the pull and beats the leaping keeper
Guptill shimmies out, Hasan bangs it short on middle. Jabbed to the covers
short and skids in to take the inside edge and roll down to third man

Haris Sohail throws the stumps down at the non-striker's end. He had one stump to aim and he nails it down to catch Bruce short. Banged in short on off stump, he does not middle a pull. Instead, he drags it to midwicket. Sets off for a single but Haris is too quick and accurate
back of a length on off, punched on the up to long-off
pitched up on off, presses forward, drives to mid-on and sets off. Rumman throws from mid-on but can't hit the stumps
back of a length outside off, cuts behind square but straight to point
good length outside off once more, stays deep in his crease and punches to cover
back of a length outside off, pokes at it towards short third man as they take another dangerous single. Quick throw in, but the batsmen were through
short and wide outside off, spins further away but it's cut next to point
taken at short third man! Short outside off, and Guptill cuts at it but is through his shot too early. Takes the top edge, and straight to the infielder. Easy take, and that's four down
full outside off, and it's crunched over cover! The fielder put in a flying, diving effort but it was so well struck. No stopping that
good length on off stump, tentatively tapped back to the bowler
back of a length on off stump and angling into Philips, defended off the back foot to the bowler

back of a length outside off, carved off the front foot to third man. They need to hurry for the second run, and he's in, but it's a direct hit from the deep. Did he ground his bat or feet? Yes he did. Got his left foot down but not his bat
back of a length on off stump, gets inside the line of the ball and punched towards mid off

good length on middle, extra bounce off the surface, and Philips drives this ball. Hasn't adjusted for the extra zip off the surface, and his on-side drive lobs into the air. Sohail's not going to miss that at midwicket. Takes his third catch of the evening
back of a length on middle stump, stays deep in his crease and opens his bat's face. Hit to point
full outside off, spins away from Grandhomme but he's lifted it over cover! Great timing, and smacked into the stands. Played with the spin and earns him the reward

Shadab has the last laugh! Slower in the air this time, and on a good length. The batsman came down the wicket too early, and the ball spun away from his bat. Quick take from the keeper, and he dislodges the bails before CDG can turn and ground his bat
back of a length on middle stump, flicked off his pads to deep midwicket
back of a length on leg stump, turns across the left hander. Misses the defense and hits his pads. Loud appeal, but turned down. Too high
good length on middle stump, punched off the back foot to cover
good length on middle stump, flicked towards short midwicket and the bowler goes racing behind it. Stopped with the dive
back of a length on off stump, slides across the batsman and through to the keeper. Tries to drive but can't connect

back of a length on middle stump, punched off the back foot and beats the diving cover fielder. Raees, from mid off, races across to his right and stops the ball from going past the second line of defense
back of a length on off stump, tapped to cover for a quick single. They're taking the fielder on, but the throw is wayward. Forces Santner to dive nonetheless
full outside off, and entices the batsman to drive. Just the perfect length, but there's no second slip! Edged and flies past first slip for a boundary
full outside off, crunched drive off the front foot to cover. But straight to the fielder placed there
back of a length outside off, tapped off the back foot towards cover
back of a length on middle stump, flicked towards the leg side but straight to the infielder
full outside off, and that's driven inside out over extra cover. Well hit, but wide long off races across to his right and intercepts
full outside off, prods forward and carves it behind to point. No chance of a run
on a good length outside off, cut away from his body but can't beat the infield. Goes to cover point once again
back of a length outside off, cut off the back foot and beats the infield on this occasion. Goes to the man in the deep
full on middle stump, tapped down the ground to long off. Only a single
back of a length on leg stump, tries to pull but not enough muscle behind that shot. Can't clear the infield
extra short on middle stump, tries the tennis-shot pull over midwicket and it's shovelled well enough! No one at cow corner, and fetches Santner some runs

full on middle stump, and it's smacked over the bowler's head!! Looks like it's going for six over long on, but Nawaz jumps high near the ropes and parries the ball back in. Excellent effort, with a lot of hang time
back of a length on middle stump, played off the back foot towards the leg side. Gives Santner the strike
good length on middle stump, but angling into the left hander. Santner goes deep into the crease and pulls towards midwicket
good length wide outside off, spins further away. Left alone by the batsman and an easy decision for the umpire
back of a length outside off, straighter one this time. Goes through to the keeper with no shot offered
full on middle stump, bunted down the ground to long on
full and wide outside off, tries to heave it over the infield, but the slog gets the outside edge. Flies past the keeper and the sliding short third-man fielder can't stop it either
back of a length on middle and leg, turned away towards short fine leg. Played with the legspin
back of a length outside off, rocks back into the crease and pulls this over the non-striker! Enough wood behind that shot, as the ball lands beyond the long-on boundary
back of a length outside off, slaps it square to the man in the deep off the back foot. Not timed well enough
quicker one that cramps the batsman. Good length  on middle stump and zips straight through. Cut from near his body to point

full on leg stump, knowing fully well that Santner would make some room. Cramped for space, and flicked off his hips behind square to deep backward square. He wants the single, but slips at the non-striker's end

delightful straight drive! Full on off stump and in the slot to be punished. Stays still and hits through the line of the ball. Shows the full face of the bat and lands in the crowd. Taken by a spectator!
good length on middle stump but angling across, opens his bat's face and runs it down to third man
full and wide outside off, driven square off the front foot but straight to cover point. Was in the slot to be hit. The bowler will feel lucky
slower ball this time. On a good length outside off but always angling away from the right hander. Tries to get bat to ball but can't
yorker outside off stump but he drives at it anyway. Takes the bottom edge and bounces over the keeper's left
back of a length outside off, tries to ramp this over the keeper, but misses. One bounce for the over, says the umpire, but the crowd boos. They reckon it should've been called a wide
full outside off, heaves it over extra cover off the back foot. Rock solid in his stance, and smacked over the infield. No stopping that

cleans him up! Real quick ball on a good length outside off. Angling into Wheeler as the batsman misses the pull shot. Takes a bottom edge and crashes into middle and leg. Huge celebration from Hasan Ali

full on middle stump, the batsman's walking across to the off side and attempts a flick. Misses the connection of the bat, and goes down the leg side after hitting his pads. No one that fine on the leg side
full on middle stump, nudged off his toes to deep midwicket
good length just outside off, angling into Santner and it's punched off the back foot to mid on
starts off with the slower ball. Pitches on a good length outside off, and Santner swats it away! Stays on the back foot and lifted over mid off. No stopping that once it clears the infield
full on middle stump, bunted down the ground to mid off. They scamper across
full on off stump, but stays very low! Goes through bat and pad and just about misses the outside of off stump. Collected by the keeper
slower ball on leg stump. The batsman has to check his slog, after seeing the change in pace. Drags it behind square to the man in the deep
good length on middle stump, Santner slogs towards the leg side but takes the bottom edge. Beats Sarfraz, who dives to his right, and it's more freaky runs
back of a length outside off, backs away and slaps this to cover. Stopped by the fielder there, but can't stop the batsmen from taking the run
full on off stump, backs away and smacks it past the non-striker to long on
full toss on off stump, sticks his bat out and runs it down to third man
slower ball but short on middle stump. Dragged off the back foot to square leg inside the circle. Well deceived by Hasan
low full toss outside off, and it's been sent packing! Slogged over long-on's head, and it's hit well enough
full on leg stump, Sodhi backs away towards the leg side but misses the shot. The ball goes between his body and leg stump. How did that not break the stumps?
back of a length on middle stump, Sodhi backs away towards the leg side before muscling a shot past cover and into the deep
good length on middle stump and it's pulled over midwicket. Wide long off races to his right but the ball lands just short of the cow-corner boundary
full outside off, bunted down the ground to long off

back of a length on middle stump, pulled along the ground to deep midwicket. They want the second, but the throw from the deep is flat and accurate. The wicket's quickly dislodged by Sarfraz, but Santner's dive saves him
excellent bouncer that follows Santner. Short on middle stump but always angling into the batsman's body, despite him backing away towards the leg side
back of a length on off stump, tries to pull but beaten by the pace. Misses the shot, and a feather edge off the bat takes it through to Sarfraz. Santner goes after a fighting knock
full outside off, angling across the right hander. Tries to drive at it, but takes a thick outside edge. Goes down to deep point

full on leg stump, Rance backs away and muscles this over the infield, but no distance behind that shot. Comfortably taken by Fakhar at long on. Swing of the bat, and enough wood behind it, but safely caught by the Navy man
short on off stump, the batsman backs away thereby missing the shot completely. Flies over his bat
short on middle stump, slower ball and the pull induces another top edge. Flies over the keeper, but short fine leg races behind to complete the catch. Pakistan win by 48 runs!
